Requirements You previous action was to use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.oSkk5srkqZ8W75gi]{Ikishoten}.

You Interact to sheathe your blade and enter @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance} if you were not already in it, and then make a vicious combo of swift and precise strikes to inflict incredible damage upon an swathe of opponents. Make a melee Strike with the required weapon. This counts as three attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. This strike gains the following effects.

Critical Success You deal twice the weapon's normal damage, plus the precision damage from hakaze (@Damage[(floor((@actor.level - 4)/3) + 2)d6[precision]]).

Success You deal the weapon's normal damage

Failure You deal half of the weapon's normal damage.

In addition, compare your roll to the AC of all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:20]. If you would hit a creature in the cone that isn't the main target, that creature takes precision damage equal to twice the damage granted by Hakaze (@Damage[(2 * (floor((@actor.level - 4)/3) + 2))d6[precision]]), with a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save. The effect of Ogi Namikiri is so greivous that creatures treat the result of this save as one degree worse.
